title: Automation Decision Tool
description: A React application that helps QA engineers decide whether a test should be automated or not based on a series of criteria questions.

title: AI Copilot Used for Manual Testing
description: I created this solution using Playwright to help Manual QA Engineers to document and execute tests. It can be used for the efficiently creation and prioritization of test cases.

title: My Software Testing Knowledge Hub
description: A comprehensive hub where I share my knowledge and resources about software testing, including best practices, methodologies, and useful tools.

title: Playwright UI Test Template - MCP/AI
description: This repository is a minimal template for UI automation with Playwright, using MCP and AI to generate test cases.

title: Fullstack Developer Course Project
description: This project was developed during my Fullstack Developer course at IBM, where I applied various technologies and methodologies learned throughout the course.

title: Mya's App
description: I have developed a fully functional application using Bootstrap and Json specifically tailored for Streamer Mya and her viewers.

title: World Tree App
description: This was a UX Design case study where I created the design concept and idea for the app, during my course with the Google team.

title: Leo Charada's Website
description: This was a UX Design case study where I created the design concept and idea for a branding website for Streamer Leo Charada.

title: Card Game
description: This was a web application created to a Streamer.
